content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a case in the district court in ljubljana slovenia the case involves a settlement and the document is dated april 21 2015 the text explains that the legal case regarding costs started on july 16 2012 and ended on april 21 2015 lasting for 3 years and 4 months the parties involved are not mentioned the text mentions that there were costs involved but it does not specify who is responsible for paying them in this case the final resolution has been reached the goods involved in the lawsuit which include two apartments have been evaluated and found to have a total value of 35000 eur the division of these goods has been decided between the expartners involved in the case the plaintiff will receive 85000 eur and the rights to the apartments while the defendant will retain ownership of the apartments the text explains that the decision in this case was based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 which deals with court settlements the court settlement in this case is confidential meaning that the details of the settlement cannot be disclosed additionally there is no translation available for this document
